data.event: Dayton began to be settled in the early 19th century, with a town survey done and a "public well" established in 1832.
The post office was established in 1837.
A devastating tornado hit the town in 1852.
The town also had several large homes, though most are now gone.

event.title: agricultural activity over the last century

data.event: The decrease in agricultural activity over the last century has reduced the population to a fraction of what it once was.
